the TransclusionDecideRule is explained here:
http://crawler.archive.org/ap=
idocs/org/archive/crawler/deciderules/TransclusionDecideRule.html

It is us=
ed for ensuring URIs normally out of scope (e.g. from another host/domain) =
is decided in if its e.g. inline images/frames/media on a page
